trans-unit.source: Represents the settings used by the client to validate the certificate presented by the service using SSL authentication.
trans-unit.target: 表示用戶端用來驗證憑證的設定，而這份憑證是由使用 SSL 驗證的服務所提供。

trans-unit.source: It also contains any certificate for the service that is explicitly configured on the client to use for encrypting messages to the service using message security.
trans-unit.target: 它另外包含的任何憑證，可讓已明確設定於用戶端上的服務在使用訊息安全性時用於加密傳給服務的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ServiceCertificate%2A> property in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會被 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ServiceCertificate%2A> 類別中的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 屬性所使用。

trans-unit.source: This code shows one way to create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼示範用來建立此類別之執行個體的一種方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the settings used to validate the service certificate obtained using SSL authentication.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來驗證透過 SSL 驗證取得之服務憑證的設定。

trans-unit.source: The settings used to validate the service certificate obtained using SSL authentication.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證透過 SSL 驗證取得之服務憑證的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication> class represents the settings used by the client proxy to authenticate service certificates that are obtained using SSL/TLS negotiation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication> 類別表示用戶端 Proxy 用來驗證服務憑證的設定，而這份憑證是使用 SSL/TLS 交涉所取得。

trans-unit.source: This code shows how to access this property.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼將示範如何存取這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default certificate to use for the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於服務的預設憑證。

trans-unit.source: The default certificate to use for the service.
trans-unit.target: 用於服務的預設憑證。

trans-unit.source: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用以憑證為基礎之訊息安全性的繫結，這個憑證會用來加密傳送給服務的訊息，而且預期會被服務用來簽署對用戶端的回覆。

trans-unit.source: This code shows how to access this property.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼將示範如何存取這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a scoped certificate to use to represent the service that the client is communicating with.
trans-unit.target: 取得已指定範圍的憑證，這個憑證可用來表示要與用戶端進行通訊的服務。

trans-unit.source: A scoped certificate to use to represent the service that the client is communicating with.
trans-unit.target: 已指定範圍的憑證，這個憑證可用來表示要與用戶端進行通訊的服務。

trans-unit.source: This property enables the client to configure the service certificate to use based on the URL of the service it communicates with.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓用戶端根據與其進行通訊之服務的 URL 設定要使用的服務憑證。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful in issued token scenarios where a client can be communicating to multiple services (the end service as well as intermediary security token services).
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端可以與多重服務 (終端服務以及中繼安全性權杖服務) 進行通訊的已核發權杖情況中，這個屬性特別有用。

trans-unit.source: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service, and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用以憑證為基礎之訊息安全性的繫結，這個憑證會用來加密傳送給服務的訊息，而且預期會被服務用來簽署對用戶端的回覆。

trans-unit.source: If a binding requires a certificate for the service and no specific certificate for the service URL is found in the `ScopedCertificates`, the default certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結需要服務的憑證，但是在 `ScopedCertificates` 中找不到服務 URL 的專屬憑證，則會使用預設的憑證。

trans-unit.source: This code shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default certificate to use for the service.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於服務的預設憑證。

trans-unit.source: These methods get a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會從符合所指定參數之指定位置的存放區中取得憑證。

trans-unit.source: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用以憑證為基礎之訊息安全性的繫結，這個憑證會用來加密傳送給服務的訊息，而且預期會被服務用來簽署對用戶端的回覆。

trans-unit.source: The subject distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: 主體辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store that the service uses to obtain the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 服務用來取得服務憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default certificate to use for the service.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於服務的預設憑證。

trans-unit.source: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用以憑證為基礎之訊息安全性的繫結，這個憑證會用來加密傳送給服務的訊息，而且預期會被服務用來簽署對用戶端的回覆。

trans-unit.source: This method gets a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches the `subjectName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從符合 `subjectName` 參數之指定位置的存放區中取得憑證。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
trans-unit.target: `storeLocation` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> 列舉型別中：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>：指派至本機電腦的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user (default).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區 (預設值)。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `storeName` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: The following code uses this method to specify an X.509 certificate to use.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用這個方法來指定要使用的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subjectName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subjectName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store the service uses to obtain the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 服務用來取得服務憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 要執行之 X.509 搜尋的類型。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 要在 X.509 憑證存放區內搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default certificate to use for the service.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於服務的預設憑證。

trans-unit.source: For bindings that use certificate-based message security, this certificate is used to encrypt messages to the service and is expected to be used by the service for signing replies to the client.
trans-unit.target: 對於使用以憑證為基礎之訊息安全性的繫結，這個憑證會用來加密傳送給服務的訊息，而且預期會被服務用來簽署對用戶端的回覆。

trans-unit.source: This method gets a certificate from the store in the specified location that matches the `findType` and `findValue` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從符合 `findType` 和 `findValue` 參數之指定位置的存放區中取得憑證。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
trans-unit.target: `storeLocation` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> 列舉型別中：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>：指派至本機電腦的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user (default).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區 (預設值)。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `storeName` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: Values for `findType` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `findType` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used enumeration is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName>, which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store.
trans-unit.target: 最常用的列舉型別 (Enumeration) 是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName>，它會針對指定之存放區內憑證的主體名稱進行不區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: This can be an imprecise search.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是不精確的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If no certificates or multiple certificates that match the criteria are found, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到憑證，或找到多個符合準則的憑證，將會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code uses this method to specify an X.509 certificate to use.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用這個方法來指定要使用的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="findValue" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="findValue" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Sets a certificate from a store and stores it in a collection indexed by the URL that sets the scope.
trans-unit.target: 從存放區中設定憑證，並將它儲存在依設定範圍之 URL 建立索引的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified subject name.
trans-unit.target: 完整主體名稱。

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store that the service uses to obtain the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 服務用來取得服務憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: The URL that sets the scope.
trans-unit.target: 設定範圍的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Sets a certificate by subject name, certificate store location, and certificate store name, and stores it in a collection to be used for the URL that sets the scope.
trans-unit.target: 依據主體名稱、憑證存放區位置和憑證存放區名稱設定憑證，並將它儲存在要用來做為設定範圍之 URL 的集合中。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
trans-unit.target: `storeLocation` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> 列舉型別中：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>：指派至本機電腦的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user (default).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區 (預設值)。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `storeName` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: This code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetService" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetService" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store that the service uses to obtain the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 服務用來取得服務憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 要執行之 X.509 搜尋的類型。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 要在 X.509 憑證存放區內搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: The URL that sets the scope.
trans-unit.target: 設定範圍的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Sets a certificate by certificate store location, certificate store name, type of X.509 search, and value to search for, and stores it in a collection to be used for the URL that sets the scope.
trans-unit.target: 依據憑證存放區位置、憑證存放區名稱、X.509 搜尋類型和要搜尋的值來設定憑證，並將它儲存在要用來做為設定範圍之 URL 的集合中。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration:
trans-unit.target: `storeLocation` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> 列舉型別中：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>：指派至本機電腦的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>: the certificate store used by the current user (default).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區 (預設值)。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>。

trans-unit.source: If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.CurrentUser>。

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `storeName` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: Values for `findType` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `findType` 的值包含在 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> 列舉型別中。

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used enumeration is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName>, which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store.
trans-unit.target: 最常用的列舉型別 (Enumeration) 是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType.FindBySubjectName>，它會針對指定之存放區內憑證的主體名稱進行不區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: This can be an imprecise search.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是不精確的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If no certificates or multiple certificates that match the criteria are found, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到憑證，或找到多個符合準則的憑證，將會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This code shows how to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetService" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetService" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試設定認證何時是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SSL certificate validator to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的 SSL 憑證驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ServiceCertificateAuthentication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ServiceCertificateAuthentication" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to use WCF X509CertificateValidator to validate a server certificate on a WCF client.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您使用 WCF X509CertificateValidator 驗證 WCF 用戶端上的伺服器憑證。
